attributes.action: Allow creative arts university students to be refunded the amount for first term
attributes.additional_details:
As an art student myself - the university still believe we should be able to get the same quality of work as before the coronavirus. We are unable to even go into university on a Saturday or Sunday due to less exposure. We are art students who need to use the facilities to create samples, or for theatre students they aren’t getting the full experience.
We all understand that the creative arts universities are trying their hardest to work around the COVID effects, but believe we should be refunded
attributes.background: I would kindly like if the government could get all creative arts universities to refund their students for the first term due to not being able to get the full experience, because they’re unable to go into the university the amount they need to.
